title: Pogačar Is Too Much of a Team Player to Target a Grand Tour Triple: ‘It’s Feasible, but I Respect My Teammates’
content:
Tadej Pogačar hints at targeting all three of the Giro, Tour, and Vuelta in one season, but it won't be any time soon.

Read the full article at Pogačar Is Too Much of a Team Player to Target a Grand Tour Triple: ‘It’s Feasible, but I Respect My Teammates’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
